Posts.Content: Jul 3, 2018 09:59PM adgnola wrote: Is it possible that you are seeing a us report related to a biopsy? Maybe the actual pathology report isn't available but they reported on the us guided biopsy. Whatever the case try to stay calm. I'm told the waiting is the hardest part, and so far that is true. I had an us guided biopsy today...I won't rest until I get the results....
